item.title: LONG-TERM Thumbnail Designer for Youtube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Are you an experienced thumbnail artist with AI-generated images? Looking for a long-term position? Keep reading.

We are a Youtube Automation company that is looking for talented, hard working and experienced freelancers to join our team.

$5 PR THUMBNAIL - (Pay raises and bonuses will be included over time)

To be the best fit for this project you need:
Know your way around AI tools like Midjourney, Mage, Stable Diffusion and others
Ability to communicate.
Dedication to meet deadlines.
Be able to deliver at least 1 thumbnail daily.
Know how to clickbait in a good way.
Make unique thumbnails.
Be familiar with the project management page Trello or have the ability to learn it.

When applying for this job, please make sure you have a relevant portfolio. If you don’t have one, you will be asked to make a trial thumbnail. This is for us to see if you are a great fit for our team or not.

Looking forward to working with you!


-Johnsen Media


Budget: $140
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:04 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:AI-Generated Image, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing
Skills: AI-Generated Image, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing
Country: Norway
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Students Club - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to join our students club and help us create engaging and professional videos. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage into high-quality videos that align with our club's brand and objectives. This includes adding effects, transitions, and soundtracks, as well as ensuring the final output meets our specifications.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit raw footage into polished videos
    - Add effects, transitions, and soundtracks
    - Ensure videos align with club's brand and objectives
    - Meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work

    Requirements:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
    - Knowledge of video editing techniques and trends in the industry

    If you are a creative and talented video editor who is passionate about storytelling and engaging with students, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us bring our club's vision to life!

Budget: $13
Posted On: June 28, 2024 11:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Urgent Video Editing - Hype Reel with Animated Typography - Upwork
item.description:
Urgent Video - V1 Due Monday 1st July, Final Version Due Tuesday 2nd July - please only apply if available! Thanks.

We're looking to create a short (2-4 minute) showreel to showcase the business - a group-training fitness studio. We already have lots of pre-edited reels and footage, we just need to edit them together in a seamless way. We'd like to tell a story and weave in the footage together using animated typography.

The ideal person would be intermediate-advanced in video editing with strong skills in animated typography, story telling and compositing. We have around 20 different videos that are edited similarly, but not exactly the same so a creative skillset and capability is ideal.

Bonus if you have experience editing gym/fitness/sports videos!

Reference/Inspiration
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FEGdwlyg1Kk

Please let me know if you have any questions!

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Instagram Reels, Showreel, 360-Degree Video Editing, Dynamic Transition, Compositing, Video Editing, Animation
Skills: Video Commercial, Instagram Reels, Showreel, 360-Degree Video Editing, Dynamic Transition, Compositing, Video Editing, Animation
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Animated Tutorial Video Editor for Online Store - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create animated tutorial videos for our online store. These videos will be used to demonstrate how to use our products and showcase their features. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and animation, and be able to bring creativity and innovation to the videos.

    Responsibilities:

    - Develop visual storytelling techniques to effectively communicate product features and benefits
    - Collaborate with the team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality videos within deadlines

    - Experience in creating animated videos using tools like Adobe After Effects or similar
    - Excellent attention to detail and ability to follow brand guidelines

item.description:
I Need GTA 5 GAMER  that can record  modded Short GTA 5 CLIPS for my YouTube Channel, Make clips using Menyoo Trainer !

You DONT need Editing (music, dialogues, titles). Just cut out repeated clips from video and send me

Need this type of MODDED Videos:  https://youtu.be/fzFCnd5jNAM?si=B79z-J8XQqVIThAu

I will give you Script & your job is to just follow the script and make Modded SHORT GTA 5 Gameplays with MENYOO PC.


Requirement:
. Basic Knowledge of Menyoo Trainer
. Gameplay in 50-60fps + HD Quality (720 or 1080p)
. The Gameplay should be in High Graphics Setting

Please send me your GTA 5 Gameplay with GRAPHIC SETTING before applying for the JOB, if your gameplay and Missions are Good, I will give you 8-10 Orders /Month. I Need long-term Gamer

Price: $4 for 1 short video, I need 6 - 8 videos a Month so it will be $24- $32 for 6 - 8 Gameplays.
Price will Increase as you IMPROVE VIDEOS

Budget: $32

item.title: English Speaking Youtube tutorial Screen record and Voiceover Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there,

I am Searching for Someone who can create & post "how to" Type Short Videos for a Youtube Automation Channel.

Videos Could be for example "how to change your username on Snapchat, or "how to delete account on Discord".

Videos can be screen recorded either on a pc or smartphone. There needs to be a Voiceover explaining what you're doing.

Example video: ( (How to delete your instagram account) )

Videos would be short-style videos with an educational purpose, aiming for a search-based channel.

We have a budget of 1$ per minute and the videos are usually arround 1 minute to maximum 7 minutes.
I'm looking for someone with whom I can work long-term and create a business relationship.

If possible make an example video on your pc or laptop like the one above.

Please make sure to let me know how many videos you could produce a month & if you have any experience in this field.

PLEASE READ **Please include an example screen recording video with your voice so we can see and hear your work in action. Without a example no reaction from our side.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:32 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Voice-Over, Screencasting Video
Skills: Voice-Over, Screencasting Video

item.title: Create 3 brand indentity videos entitled "We are Morgan 6" - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
Morgan 6 LLC is seeking a skilled video producer to create three compelling videos that highlight our expertise in Irregular Warfare and gray zone competition. These videos will be inspired by "Ghosts in the Machine" and should effectively communicate our unique capabilities and dedication to supporting the US government in these critical domains. Each video should be between 30-90 seconds, primarily utilizing stock footage.

Scope of Work:

Project Kickoff:

Initial meeting to discuss project objectives, target audience, and desired tone.
Review of existing materials and resources to understand our brand and messaging.
Video Concept and Script Development:

Develop three unique concepts for the videos, each with a clear narrative aligned with "We are Morgan 6."
Create engaging scripts that highlight our expertise in Irregular Warfare and gray zone competition.
Ensure scripts are concise, impactful, and resonate with our target audience.
Stock Footage Selection:

Research and select high-quality stock footage that aligns with the video concepts and scripts.
Ensure footage is relevant, visually appealing, and effectively conveys the intended message.
Video Editing and Production:

Edit and produce three videos, each 30-90 seconds in length.
Incorporate stock footage, music, voiceovers, and graphics to create a cohesive and engaging final product.
Ensure videos have a consistent look and feel, aligning with our brand identity.
Graphics and Animation:

Create or source professional graphics and animations that enhance the video's narrative.
Ensure graphics are relevant to the subject matter and contribute to the overall impact of the videos.
Voiceover and Music:

Select or provide appropriate voiceover talent that aligns with the tone and message of the videos.
Choose background music that complements the visuals and enhances the overall viewing experience.
Review and Revisions:

Provide initial drafts of the videos for review.
Incorporate feedback and make necessary revisions to ensure the final videos meet our expectations.
Final Delivery:

Deliver high-quality, final versions of the three videos in the required formats.
Provide all project files, including edited footage, scripts, graphics, and audio files.
Deliverables:

Three final videos (30-90 seconds each) highlighting "We are Morgan 6" and our expertise in Irregular Warfare and gray zone competition.
Project files and assets used in video production.
Documentation of any stock footage, music, or other licensed materials used.
Qualifications:

Proven experience in video production, particularly for government or defense-related industries.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous work with similar clients.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with our team.
Timeline:

Project kickoff:July 2024
Concept and script development: 1 Month
Stock footage selection and video editing: 1 Month
Review and revisions: 1 Month
Final delivery: 1 OCT 2024
Budget: TBD

Please provide a detailed budget proposal with your application, including any anticipated costs for stock footage, music, voiceover talent, etc.
How to Apply:

Submit your proposal including your portfolio, relevant experience, and a brief outline of how you plan to approach this project.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a DRAWING artist/ video editor for my "Personal Development"youtube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey!

I am looking for a professional to make drawings, create / edit one YouTube video about Self-Improvement and Personal Development.

The length of the video is approximately 8 minutes long and pay $30 dollar per video.

I will provide the script and voice over. (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to make drawings, find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).

Ideal candidates:
- Have a degree in Visual Communications Art or a very good understanding about this.
- Experience in making 2D and 3D animations, drawing and editing. And have a PEN TABLET to draw.
- Have experience in hand-drawn 2D animations and can present samples of their work in a portfolio.

I am looking for someone who:
- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.
- Has experience with Clip Studio Paint and Procreate
- Has experience using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve or After Effects and more skills mentioned in the job post.
- Fluent in English
- Able to work within the deadline (24 hours)
- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.

However, you can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging. Viewers must be engaged from the first seconds they choose to watch the video. And subscribe and like calls to action must be edited in a subtle manner not taking the energy and focus away from the video. Perfect example of what's needed, check out this link here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LEbHTHrpn_ex-bgoZwqpTWkzo98Z7js8/view?usp=sharing

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.

Example of videos we need to have produced will be shared to those who make the next phase of the job hiring process.

Also, if you’ve ever made a youtube cashcow video in the Self-Improvement and Personal Development niche, please attach samples of your work. Make sure you only share google drive links. No downloadable links.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

item.ns0:encoded:
Hey!

I am looking for a professional to make drawings, create / edit one YouTube video about Self-Improvement and Personal Development.

The length of the video is approximately 8 minutes long and pay $30 dollar per video.

I will provide the script and voice over. (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to make drawings, find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).

Ideal candidates:
- Have a degree in Visual Communications Art or a very good understanding about this.
- Experience in making 2D and 3D animations, drawing and editing. And have a PEN TABLET to draw.
- Have experience in hand-drawn 2D animations and can present samples of their work in a portfolio.

I am looking for someone who:
- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.
- Has experience with Clip Studio Paint and Procreate
- Has experience using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve or After Effects and more skills mentioned in the job post.
- Fluent in English
- Able to work within the deadline (24 hours)
- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.

However, you can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging. Viewers must be engaged from the first seconds they choose to watch the video. And subscribe and like calls to action must be edited in a subtle manner not taking the energy and focus away from the video. Perfect example of what's needed, check out this link here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LEbHTHrpn_ex-bgoZwqpTWkzo98Z7js8/view?usp=sharing

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.

Example of videos we need to have produced will be shared to those who make the next phase of the job hiring process.

Also, if you’ve ever made a youtube cashcow video in the Self-Improvement and Personal Development niche, please attach samples of your work. Make sure you only share google drive links. No downloadable links.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

item.title: Video Compilation for Website Banner - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to compile several videos into a single video for our website banner. The video should have smooth and simple transitions, such as fade-in and out effects, to create an engaging visual experience for our visitors.
The final video should accurately represent our work process and products.
Cuts, speed-up, brightness, balance, and transition adjustments are welcome.
We need the final result to be playable in a loop like it's never-ending.
The ideal candidate should have experience with video editing software and be able to work with different video formats. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this project.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Transitions
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 28, 2024 10:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Photo Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
